databases.name: TaskList
databases.desc: Where all history tasks are stored by WebImager

columns.name: task_db
columns.desc: The path of where the task database is

columns.name: task_donepages
columns.desc: Total pages of the task that has been done

columns.name: task_timecost
columns.desc: Time has been spent by the task. *Note* this should be integer.

columns.name: task_createtime
columns.desc: The time when the task was created.

columns.name: task_report
columns.desc: The path of the task report generated by task process

columns.name: task_remote_id
columns.desc: The remote task ID if this task is created to runnning on server

columns.name: plan_starttime
columns.desc: The specified start time in millisecond since EPoch, if this is a plan

columns.name: plan_lasttime
columns.desc: The specified stop time in millisecond since EPoch, if this is a plan

columns.name: hash_csv_path
columns.desc: The file records all files hash downloaded or snapshoted.

columns.name: hash_csv_hash
columns.desc: The md5 hash of the hash csv file

columns.name: task_file
columns.desc: The corresponding task file generated by GUI
